version_description:
NEW: Beautifully designed Dawn Widgets, now available on iOS 14.
- Select from 7 unique widgets of different sizes and functionalities for your homepage.
- Month widgets: Displays greeting with current and/or upcoming months
- Today widgets: Display greeting with a list of your tasks for today
- List widget: Compact widget to display your tasks for today
- Time widget: A large widget displaying tasks for today with current and next month

Bug fixes:
- Potential fix for duplicated events and sync issues (recommended to sync and re-sync affected calendars)
- Fixed duplicated daily tasks (recommended to delete and re-add affected daily tasks)
- Fixed current date sometimes not refreshing
- General performance and UI improvements

Visit our website and join us on social media for the latest updates:
- Website: www.enulus.com
- Twitter: twitter.com/minimaldawn
- Reddit: www.reddit.com/r/dawnapp/

- Fix: Potential startup crashes
- Fix: Past events not marked as completed
- Fix: Missing notification permissions prompt

- NEW: Add and edit complex repetition rules
- Fix complex repetition rules not syncing (May require unsync and resync of affected calendars/reminder lists)

- Fix widget heatmap appearing lighter on weekends
- Fix instances where notifications aren't scheduled
- Fix duplicating events/reminders when syncing calendars or tasks with default Space set

Huge update! Thanks so much for all your feedback.
This update includes many highly anticipated and requested features, be sure to check them all out!

- NEW: Beautifully designed alternate app icons. Head over to Settings > Appearance > App Icon to select an alternate icon for Dawn.
- NEW: Display tomorrow and upcoming tasks on Dawn's today page. Head over to Settings > Behavior > Time > Show Upcoming to enable this feature.
- NEW: Medium Time widget to display today's date, upcoming tasks, and month heatmap.
- NEW: Small Time widget to display today's date and upcoming tasks.
- NEW: Change Tint color for Dawn widgets. Tap and hold a widget then select Edit Widget to select a color.
- Fix: Startup and various crashes
